text: The Million Dollar Hotel is a 2000 German American British drama movie directed by Wim Wenders and starring Jeremy Davies, Milla Jovovich, Mel Gibson, Jimmy Smits, Gloria Stuart, Amanda Plummer, Julian Sands, Peter Stormare, Conrad Roberts. It also features the music of Bono. ==Other websites== * * Category:2000 drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies directed by Wim Wenders Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in hotels
title: The Million Dollar Hotel
